list-item.p: 1) How important is vegetation relative to climate, topography, and land use in statistical-correlative models of fire distribution?
2) Does the explicit integration of vegetation lead to different conclusions about future fire patterns?
3) Are there differences in projections based on the use of static versus dynamic vegetation inputs or dynamic simulations of fire?
4) Are any projected differences in projections mediated by climate scenario or size of fire modeled?
